p: Mice were euthanatized at the end of experiment by injection of a high dose of a mixture of 10 mg/Kg Xylazine (Bayer, Puteaux, France) and 5 mg/Kg of Ketamine (Merial, Lyon, France). After perfusion with 3 ml PBS to wash out blood, the lungs were removed, homogenized, divided into two lots, and the homogenates used to perform the cytokine assay and flow cytometry analysis as previously described [ 15].
